column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday September 9 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Work Scheduled for I-75N at the Clays Ferry Bridge:
column4: Bridge deck overlay project scheduled from Wednesday 9/8 at 9:00 p.m. thru Thursday 10/7.

column3: Work Scheduled for I-75N at the Clays Ferry Bridge:
column4: Two lanes will remain open between Exit 97 and the end of the bridge.

column3: Work Scheduled for I-75N at the Clays Ferry Bridge:
column4: Speed limit will be 55 mph.  Use added caution if traveling in this area.
